subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Colonel John, the winner of three of five starts and second in the other two races, will start from the No. 5 post position in Saturday’s Santa Anita Derby. Colonel John, a Tiznow colt, was made the early 2-1 favorite in the one-and-one-eighth-mile Santa Anita, which drew a field of 11. El Gato Malo will start from the No. 8 post and was the second choice at 5-2.
